duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate technology related design and construction efforts that meet the constructability, quality, financial, and technical standards.
Support deployment of Aptitude strategies for project delivery to achieve project financial, quality, and performance objectives.
Coordinate and inspect work, prepare reports, and track project progress.
Manage project risks, subcontractor performance, financials, and resource allocation.
Lead the project close out process and provide training and mentorship to others.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in construction management, engineering, or related field. In lieu of the above requirements, equivalent relevant experience will be considered.
